survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Autonomous Vehicle Rides
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have experienced rides in autonomous vehicles to understand their satisfaction levels, concerns, and suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with your recent autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better clarity and consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with your recent autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most impressive? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Communication from the vehicle (e.g., alerts, notifications)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied impressions.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most impressive? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Communication from the vehicle (e.g., alerts, notifications)

questions.question_text: Were there any moments during the ride where you felt unsafe or uncomfortable?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to identify safety concerns.

script.question_text: Were there any moments during the ride where you felt unsafe or uncomfortable?

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific instances where you felt unsafe or uncomfortable during the ride.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q3 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback on safety concerns.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific instances where you felt unsafe or uncomfortable during the ride.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q3 is answered with 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle service again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure future usage intent.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use an autonomous vehicle service again in the future?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions to improve the autonomous vehicle ride experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions to improve the autonomous vehicle ride experience?
